settings.text: "Best boots I have ever bought! I don't like to buy footwear without trying them on first but these were too cool to pass up. WOW! I wore them right out of the box and haven't looked back. . . I get loads of comments on them. But what sold me was the comfort."
settings.author: Shari H.

settings.text: "So pretty! I love inkkas! This is my third pair and I always get so many compliments. They're comfortable, beautiful, true to size, and so unique!"
settings.author: Saviel M.

settings.text: "HAPPY! These boots make me happy! I'm done with basic boots. The fit, the woven textiles -- just great unique style. Very comfortable!"
settings.author: Toni A.

settings.text: "Most favorite shoes ever! They are plush, colorful, and keep my feet happy through a 12 hour shift. Plus they brighten my boring scrubs."
settings.author: Rebecca S.

settings.text: "These were the first hiking boot I ever bought myself! They are comfortable AND stylish. I love that they don't look like the typical hiking boot I see when I'm out on the trails."
settings.author: Jasmine J.

settings.text: "I had never seen such quality, stylish, and unique shoes before inkkas! I love putting these on every day. I'm a teacher and my kids always look to see if I'm wearing them!"
settings.author: Eve R.

settings.text: "I'm in love! The design is so unique & fun! Everyone comments on them. They are super comfy!"
settings.author: Illy S.

settings.text: Step Into the World With Us

We believe in the necessity of quality handcrafted footwear, and in the power of art to express, inspire, heal & connect.

That is why more than 10 years ago we set out to make handcrafted shoes designed to feel good, not only through their cushy comfort, but through artful, one-of-a-kind designs that spark joy & connection every time you wear them. Our styles celebrate beauty around the world, featuring handwoven authentic global textiles and hand-drawn designs that bring nature to life. They will inspire your every step.

From our soles to yours, we invite you to step into the world in your Inkkas!
follow us and tag #inkkas for a chance to be featured!

settings.title: Planting Towards Carbon-Neutral
settings.text: We plant a tree for every purchase with trees.org. Over the years, that has amounted to more than 445,000 trees! We stand by the quality of our products, which are made responsibly and ethically.
With one-of-a-kind designs celebrating beauty around the world, and ultra-comfy handcrafted forms, Inkkas are designed to make your feet and your heart happy.

settings.title: Good for the Sole
settings.text: Learn more about the global inspirations behind our hand-drawn designs, explore lookbooks, and more!

settings.heading: Just In and Sure to Sell Out
settings.description: Your new Summer-to-Fall besties have arrived: colorful, supportive and simply nothing else like them. ❤️ Limited quantities available so snag your pair today!
